verses.verse: The first<WG3391> day of the week<WG4521> comes<WG2064> Mary<WG3137> Magdalene<WG3094> early,<WG4404> when it was yet<WG2089> dark,<WG4653> to the sepulcher,<WG3419> and sees<WG991> the stone<WG3037> taken<WG142> away from the sepulcher.<WG3419>

Then<WG3767> she runs,<WG5143> and comes<WG2064> to Simon<WG4613> Peter,<WG4074> and to the other<WG243> disciple,<WG3101> whom<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> loved,<WG5368> and said<WG3004> to them, They have taken<WG142> away the LORD<WG2962> out of the sepulcher,<WG3419> and we know<WG1492> not where<WG4226> they have laid<WG5087> him.
Peter<WG4074> therefore<WG3767> went<WG1831> forth,<WG1831> and that other<WG243> disciple,<WG3101> and came<WG2064> to the sepulcher.<WG3419>
So<WG1161> they ran<WG5143> both<WG1417> together:<WG3674> and the other<WG243> disciple<WG3101> did outrun<WG4370> <WG5032> Peter,<WG4074> and came<WG2064> first<WG4413> to the sepulcher.<WG3419>
And he stooping<WG3879> down,<WG3879> and looking in, saw<WG991> the linen<WG3608> clothes<WG3608> lying;<WG2749> yet<WG3305> went<WG1525> he not in.
Then<WG3767> comes<WG2064> Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> following<WG190> him, and went<WG1525> into<WG1519> the sepulcher,<WG3419> and sees<WG2334> the linen<WG3608> clothes<WG3608> lie,<WG2749>
And the napkin,<WG4676> that was about<WG1909> his head,<WG2776> not lying<WG2749> with the linen<WG3608> clothes,<WG3608> but wrapped<WG1794> together<WG1794> in a place<WG5117> by itself.<WG5565>
Then<WG5119> went<WG1525> in also<WG2532> that other<WG243> disciple,<WG3101> which<WG3588> came<WG2064> first<WG4413> to the sepulcher,<WG3419> and he saw,<WG1492> and believed.<WG4100>
For as yet<WG3764> they knew<WG1492> not the scripture,<WG1124> that he must<WG1163> rise<WG450> again<WG450> from the dead.<WG3498>
Then<WG3767> the disciples<WG3101> went<WG565> away<WG565> again<WG3825> to their own<WG1438> home.<WG1438>

But Mary<WG3137> stood<WG2476> without<WG1854> at<WG4314> the sepulcher<WG3419> weeping:<WG2799> and as she wept,<WG2799> she stooped<WG3879> down,<WG3879> and looked into<WG1519> the sepulcher,<WG3419>

And sees<WG2334> two<WG1417> angels<WG32> in white<WG3022> sitting,<WG2516> the one<WG1520> at<WG4314> the head,<WG2776> and the other<WG1520> at<WG4314> the feet,<WG4228> where<WG3699> the body<WG4983> of Jesus<WG2424> had lain.<WG2749>

And they say<WG3004> to her, Woman,<WG1135> why weep<WG2799> you? She said<WG3004> to them, Because<WG3754> they have taken<WG142> away my LORD,<WG2962> and I know<WG1492> not where<WG4226> they have laid<WG5087> him.
And when she had thus<WG5023> said,<WG2036> she turned<WG4762> herself back,<WG3694> and saw<WG2334> Jesus<WG2424> standing,<WG2476> and knew<WG1492> not that it was Jesus.<WG2424>

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her, Woman,<WG1135> why<WG5101> weep<WG2799> you? whom<WG5101> seek<WG2212> you? She, supposing<WG1380> him to be the gardener,<WG2780> said<WG3004> to him, Sir,<WG2962> if<WG1487> you have borne<WG941> him hence, tell<WG2036> me where<WG4226> you have laid<WG5087> him, and I will take<WG142> him away.
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her, Mary. <WG3137> She turned<WG4762> herself, and said<WG3004> to him, Rabboni;<WG4462> which<WG3739> is to say,<WG3004> Master.<WG1320>

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her, Touch<WG680> me not; for I am not yet<WG3768> ascended<WG305> to my Father:<WG3962> but go<WG4198> to my brothers,<WG80> and say<WG2036> to them, I ascend<WG305> to my Father,<WG3962> and your<WG5216> Father;<WG3962> and to my God,<WG2316> and your<WG5216> God. <WG2316>
Mary<WG3137> Magdalene<WG3094> came<WG2064> and told<WG518> the disciples<WG3101> that she had seen<WG3708> the LORD,<WG2962> and that he had spoken<WG2036> these<WG5023> things to her.

Then<WG3767> the same<WG1565> day<WG2250> at evening,<WG3798> being the first<WG3391> day<WG2250> of the week,<WG4521> when the doors<WG2374> were shut<WG2808> where<WG3699> the disciples<WG3101> were assembled<WG4863> for fear<WG5401> of the Jews,<WG2453> came<WG2064> Jesus<WG2424> and stood<WG2476> in the middle,<WG3319> and said<WG3004> to them, Peace <WG1515> be to you.

And when he had so<WG5124> said,<WG2036> he showed<WG1166> to them his hands<WG5495> and his side.<WG4125> Then<WG3767> were the disciples<WG3101> glad,<WG5463> when they saw<WG1492> the LORD.<WG2962>
Then<WG3767> said<WG2036> Jesus<WG2424> to them again,<WG3825> Peace <WG1515> be to you: as my Father<WG3962> has sent<WG649> me, even<WG2504> so send<WG3992> I you.
And when he had said<WG2036> this,<WG5124> he breathed<WG1720> on<WG1720> them, and said<WG3004> to them, Receive<WG2983> you the Holy<WG40> Ghost: <WG4151>
Whose<WG5100> soever <WG3745> <WG302> sins<WG266> you remit,<WG863> they are remitted<WG863> to them; and whose<WG5100> soever <WG3745> <WG302> sins you retain,<WG2902> they are retained. <WG2902>
But Thomas,<WG2381> one<WG1520> of the twelve,<WG1427> called<WG3004> Didymus,<WG1324> was not with them when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> came.<WG2064>

The other<WG243> disciples<WG3101> therefore<WG3767> said<WG3004> to him, We have seen<WG3708> the LORD.<WG2962> But he said<WG2036> to them, Except<WG3362> I shall see<WG1492> in his hands<WG5495> the print<WG5179> of the nails,<WG2247> and put<WG906> my finger<WG1147> into<WG1519> the print<WG5179> of the nails,<WG2247> and thrust<WG906> my hand<WG5495> into<WG1519> his side,<WG4125> I will not believe.<WG4100>

And after<WG3326> eight<WG3638> days<WG2250> again<WG3825> his disciples<WG3101> were within,<WG2080> and Thomas<WG2381> with them: then came<WG2064> Jesus,<WG2424> the doors<WG2374> being shut,<WG2808> and stood<WG2476> in the middle,<WG3319> and said,<WG2036> Peace <WG1515> be to you.

Then<WG1534> said<WG3004> he to Thomas,<WG2381> Reach<WG5342> here<WG5602> your finger,<WG1147> and behold<WG2396> my hands;<WG5495> and reach<WG5342> here<WG5602> your hand,<WG5495> and thrust <WG906> it into<WG1519> my side:<WG4125> and be not faithless,<WG571> but believing. <WG4103>
And Thomas<WG2381> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to him, My LORD<WG2962> and my God.<WG2316>

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him, Thomas,<WG2381> because<WG3754> you have seen<WG3708> me, you have believed:<WG4100> blessed <WG3107> are they that have not seen,<WG1492> and yet have believed. <WG4100>

And many<WG4183> other<WG243> signs<WG4592> truly<WG3303> did<WG4160> Jesus<WG2424> in the presence<WG1799> of his disciples,<WG3101> which<WG3739> are not written<WG1125> in this<WG5129> book:<WG975>

But these<WG5023> are written,<WG1125> that you might believe<WG4100> that Jesus<WG2424> is the Christ,<WG5547> the Son<WG5207> of God;<WG2316> and that believing<WG4100> you might have<WG2192> life<WG2222> through<WG1722> his name.<WG3686>
